name: Tap Trick
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 48.

Entry: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/tap-trick

give us very favourable reviews for good luck and clear skin.

One button skateboard game, where each level is your own personal skate park to mess around in.

Controls:

  • Tap to jump
  • Hold to Spin or Push Forward

Developed by

  • Salman Shurie (@Salman_Shh )  - Design, Code, Levels
  • Britt Brady (@Britt_t_Brady) - Audio & Character Art
